title: FS: 1912 T202 Triple Folder Cy Young / Johnny Kling PSA 2.5

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 T202 Triple Folder Cy Young / Johnny Kling PSA 2.5
posts.post_content:
Nice bright colors and border. The price is ---- PayPal friends/family. Where else can you get a beautiful Cy Young this cheap?? Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!!!

Joe K.
